[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList,us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditAmortizationOfGainLossStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses is included. In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses Value : 2,568,000 Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:RetirementPlanTypeAxis=us-gaap:OtherPostretirementBenefitPlansDefinedBenefitMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/915913/000091591322000027/alb-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCredit has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCreditStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList,DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCredit is included. In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCredit Value : 36,000 Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:RetirementPlanSponsorLocationAxis=us-gaap:ForeignPlanMember, us-gaap:RetirementPlanTypeAxis=us-gaap:PensionPlansDefinedBenefitMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/915913/000091591322000027/alb-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedReturnOnPlanAssets has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExpectedReturnLossStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList,DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedReturnOnPlanAssets is included. In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.

Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/915913/000091591322000027/alb-20211231.htm 4

In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.
